2 Typography

Here we will talk about the use of diferent typefaces.

Brandon Grotesque

Use X when ....

Font sizes

Font-sizes Value Modifier
Brandon Grotesque 4rem xgiant
Brandon Grotesque 3rem giant
Brandon Grotesque 2.5rem xxxlarge
Brandon Grotesque 2rem xxlarge
Brandon Grotesque 1.5rem xlarge
Brandon Grotesque 1.2rem large
Brandon Grotesque 1rem medium
Brandon Grotesque .8rem small
Brandon Grotesque .7rem xsmall
Brandon Grotesque .6rem xxsmall
Brandon Grotesque .5rem xxxsmall

Font weights

Font-weights Value Modifier
Brandon Grotesque 900 bolder
Brandon Grotesque 700 bold
Brandon Grotesque 500 semibold
Brandon Grotesque 400 normal
Brandon Grotesque 200 light

Open Sans

When and how use Open Sans...
